title: Who's better, Lil Wayne or Jay Z? - Quora

response.answer_text: Jay Z. I’m not even being a stan. Lil Wayne was a great lyricist and made some good music, but he’s fell off really hard. Jay Z on the other hand has got a little worse as he’s gone on. But he’s said that he dumbed himself down, and he still makes good music, it’s just not AS good as Blueprint or Reasonable Doubt. Lil Wayne is just bad now. He has a good song now and then, while Jay has a great ratio on every one of his albums. Lil Wayne in his prime vs Jay in his prime would be a lot closer, but overall, Wayne gets stepped on.

While Jay Z is more famous than Wayne, and most likely has a higher networth, Wayne I believe is better lyrically and he uploads more. But Wayne’s a bit weird you know, Jay Z is a nice down-to-earth guy. This question can only be answered with opinions mate, not facts. I believe Lil Wayne is better but he’s my fav artist so yea, just my opinion.
